welcome.title: Welcome to Mariposa House
welcome.description: Mariposa House is a community sharing the joy of becoming 'a new creation' in Christ.
welcome.message1: Thank you for visiting Mariposa House.
welcome.message3: Whether this is your first time at church or you're returning after a while,
welcome.message4: whatever your background, please come as you are.

mariposa.title: The Meaning of 'Mariposa'
mariposa.description: Mariposa means 'butterfly' in Spanish. The butterfly transforms from a caterpillar through a chrysalis into a beautiful butterfly, symbolizing our faith journey of being transformed and made new in Christ.
mariposa.content2: A butterfly transforms from a caterpillar, through a chrysalis, into a beautiful winged creature. This remarkable metamorphosis symbolizes the grace of becoming "a new creation" in Christ.
mariposa.content3: Dying to our old selves, growing in God's love, and being daily transformed into the likeness of Christ — this is the vision of Mariposa House.
mariposa.scripture: "And we all, who with unveiled faces contemplate the Lord's glory, are being transformed into his image with ever-increasing glory."

galatians.text: "I have been crucified with Christ and I no longer live, but Christ lives in me."
galatians.translation: 私はキリストとともに十字架につけられました。もはや私が生きているのではなく、キリストが私のうちに生きておられるのです。

corinthians.text: "Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!"
corinthians.translation: ですから、だれでもキリストのうちにあるなら、その人は新しく造られた者です。

ephesians.text: "For we are God's handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works."
ephesians.translation: 実に、私たちは神の作品であって、良い行いをするためにキリスト・イエスにあって造られたのです。

cta.title: We Look Forward to Meeting You
cta.description: If you have any questions or interest, please feel free to contact us.

beliefs.title: What We Believe
beliefs.intro: Mariposa House stands firmly on historic, orthodox Christian faith based on the Bible.

bible.title: The Bible
bible.description: The 66 books of the Bible are the inspired, inerrant Word of God and the sole authority for faith and practice.

trinity.title: The Trinity
trinity.description: We believe in one God eternally existing in three persons: Father, Son, and Holy Spirit — the triune God.

jesus.title: Jesus Christ
jesus.description: Jesus Christ is fully God and fully man, born of the Virgin Mary, died on the cross as our substitute for sin, and rose again on the third day.

salvation.title: Salvation
salvation.description: All people are separated from God by sin, but by God's grace, we are saved through faith in Jesus Christ alone.

holySpirit.title: The Holy Spirit
holySpirit.description: The Holy Spirit dwells in believers, illuminating truth, guiding, and transforming us into the likeness of Christ.

service.title: Sunday Worship
service.description: We worship the Lord together through praise, prayer, the proclamation of the Word, and fellowship.

bibleStudy.title: Wednesday Bible Study
bibleStudy.description: We gather every Wednesday to carefully study the Bible and deepen our understanding.

bsf.title: BSF Gathering
bsf.description: Through BSF (Bible Study Fellowship), we systematically study the Bible and pursue growth in faith.

agape.title: Agape Love
agape.subtitle: Agape Love
agape.description: Agape means 'self-sacrificial, unconditional love' in Greek. Just as God loved us, loving one another is the Lord's command and our joy.
agape.scripture: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.

cta.title: Join Us
cta.description: First-time visitors are warmly welcome. Please feel free to contact us.

Privacy.intro: Mariposa House (hereinafter 'the Church') recognizes the importance of personal information and strives to protect it.

collection.title: 1. Collection of Personal Information
collection.content: The Church may collect personal information such as name, email address, and inquiry content through our contact form.

use.title: 2. Purpose of Use
use.content: The collected personal information will be used for the following purposes:
purposes: Information about worship services and events

thirdParty.title: 3. Disclosure to Third Parties
thirdParty.content: The Church will not provide personal information to third parties without prior consent, except as required by law.

cookies.title: 4. Use of Cookies
cookies.content: This website may use cookies to improve user experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings.

security.title: 5. Security
security.content: The Church takes appropriate security measures to prevent leakage, loss, or alteration of personal information.

contact.title: 6. Contact
contact.content: For inquiries regarding the handling of personal information, please contact us through our contact form.

changes.title: 7. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: The Church may change this policy as necessary. The revised policy will take effect when posted on this website.
